title: Angle Hack
imgSrc: Two people coding infront of a computer
post:
I recently went to a hackathon in another country and it was called angel hack!

I had a really fantastic time and although I didn't win the main prize I did manage to get second place! I'm looking forward to next year!

title: New Tor Hack found!
post:
Surprise Surprise Firefox has recently discovered a 0 day exploit which affects all Tor users.

Tor is a program originality developed by the US Navy for encrypted message but is now being used by people online to protect there anonymity.

title: Why I chose to use material design
post:
Material design is a framework created by google. It provides guildlines on how to style certain elements in your code just as this card design you are looking at right now!

There are pre built frameworks where you can plug and play although I rewrote each one so that it would all be original on this site!

Tor is a program originality developed by the US Navy for encrypted message but is now being used by people online to protect there anonymity.

title: Website live!
imgSrc: Circular image with the word blog in the middle.
post:
Welcome! Although short this is the first blog post on my new portfolio site. I'm hoping to use this as a single place to collect my thoughts, projects and resume! Please let me know if you have any ideas for the website!
